snippet: A 4-year-old found with bruising and signs of trauma was in the care of a babysitter when he was found.
abstract: New York City detectives are investigating death of 4-year-old boy in Midtown Manhattan apartment building; boy, not immediately identified, was in care of 37-year-old woman investigators describe as babysitter; no charges have been filed.
lead_paragraph: A 4-year-old found with bruising and signs of trauma was in the care of a babysitter when he was found.

headline.main: In Babysitter’s Care, Boy, 4, Dies in Midtown
headline.print_headline: In Babysitter’s Care, Boy, 4, Dies in Midtown
